Un joueur devient gagnant lorsqu’il réso: A player becomes a winner when they solve all the puzzles. The hunt ends as soon as the expected number of winners is reached.
Vous arrêtez la chasse manuellement, grâ: You stop the hunt manually, thanks to the button located in the hunt edit panel.
Voulez-vous vraiment supprimer la récomp: Do you really want to delete the reward?
Voulez-vous vraiment arrêter la chasse ?: Do you really want to end the hunt?
